channel.title: Dear Gabby
channel.itunes:summary: Dear Gabby is a weekly show where #1 New York Times bestselling author and international speaker, Gabby Bernstein, offers up real-time coaching, straight talk and BIG LOVE. Episodes include unscripted Q&A sessions where she coaches listeners through life-changing transformations, plus free-flowing conversations about personal growth and spirituality with unique and inspiring guests.

item.title: How to Be Successful and Not Burn Out—Big Talk with Kelly Ripa
item.itunes:title: How to Be Successful and Not Burn Out—Big Talk with Kelly Ripa
item.description:
Some people are like sunshine in human form. Kelly Ripa is one of them. Listen to her Dear Gabby Big Talk for tips on how to be successful without burning out, and to get Kelly’s playbook for how to keep yourself grounded and balanced while living a big and boisterous life. Kelly’s not just a TV legend, she’s a true healer. I can’t wait for you to experience how deep she goes in this candid conversation.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Kelly Ripa is a household name whose career at ABC has spanned more than three decades. As the Emmy-award-winning host of the Live! franchise, Kelly has interviewed cultural icons from politicians to celebrities and athletes. She and her husband, Mark Conseulous, founded their production company, Milojo Productions, in 2007. Kelly’s beautiful new book is Live Wire: Long-Winded Short Stories. It’s a must-read! 

In this episode of Dear Gabby I share some of my favorite techniques for feeling grounded and soothed, including the heart hold. You can learn more about this calming technique—along with several others—in my latest book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. https://bit.ly/3SH1pdj

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3U4nsvs 

If you need additional support, please refer to this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3fgQSrr

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Start a new healthy habit today. Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed's DS-01™ Daily Synbiotic.

 

Get glasses as ever-changing as you are, with Pair. Go to paireyewear.com/gabby for 15% off your first purchase.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering an exclusive offer of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Never lose your edge with the all-new Lexus RX. Experience Amazing at your Lexus dealer.

 

Produced by Dear Media. 

 

Please note that this episode may contain paid endorsements and advertisements for products and services. Individuals on the show may have a direct or indirect financial interest in products or services referred to in this episode.

item.title: 4 Secrets for Abundance!
item.itunes:title: 4 Secrets for Abundance!
item.description:
Want to make money doing what you love?! Today on Dear Gabby, I’m sharing a live talk (from back in the day) that will help you release the blocks that are keeping you small, stuck or unsatisfied in your career. I’ll reveal the 4 steps to take to fearlessly pursue a passion-driven profession that is radically abundant. After you listen, be sure to share this with any friends who are struggling to find meaning in their career.
 

Want more manifesting help? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, I lead a different challenge each quarter to give you a spiritual jumpstart in every area of your life. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3DbDLjn

If today’s Dear Gabby inspires you to ignite passion in your life, I highly recommend listening to Add More ~ing to Your Life. This is the first book I wrote, and it’s finally available on Audible! https://bit.ly/3SKDqd7

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3FoyKGP

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

You can grow thicker, healthier hair AND support our show by going to Nutrafol.com and entering the promo code GABBY to save fifteen dollars off your first month’s subscription. This is their best offer ANYWHERE and it is only available to US customers for a limited time.

 

Go to shopify.com/gabby to start selling online today and recieve a FREE trial!

 

Never lose your edge with the all-new Lexus RX. Experience Amazing at your Lexus dealer.

 

Produced by Dear Media. 

 

Please note that this episode may contain paid endorsements and advertisements for products and services. Individuals on the show may have a direct or indirect financial interest in products or services referred to in this episode.

item.title: 3 Ways to Connect to Your Inner Guidance System
item.itunes:title: 3 Ways to Connect to Your Inner Guidance System
item.description:
In this Dear Gabby, you’ll get an exclusive preview of my latest audiobook, Add More ~Ing to Your Life: A Hip Guide to Happiness. This is the first book I wrote, and it’s become a classic … because it works! The book offers a simple equation for making happiness a way of life by accessing your ~Ing (your inner guide). If you want clear direction for reversing negative thought patterns and creating positive change, press play.

 

The audiobook version of my first book is now available for the first time!  Add More ~Ing to Your Life is the book that started me on my path of spiritual guidance more than a decade ago. Discover how to make happiness a way of life by accessing your inner guide, your ~Ing! Listen to Add More ~Ing to Your Life now on Audible. DearGabby.com/addmoreing

 

In my 30-day ~Ing Equation, I lay out crystal clear steps to help you bulldoze negative thought patterns and create personal change. The equation includes simple and fun practices such as positive affirmations, physical activity and visualization meditations.

 

Prepare to change your life. You'll release your negativity, choose happiness and become a magnet for everything you want to manifest. 

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3MCP0FW

 

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

When you want to be a better problem solver, therapy can get you there. Visit BetterHelp.com/deargabby today to get 10% off your first month.

 

Right now, you can get 15% off this dynamic duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout.

 

Perfect Bar knows it will be love at first bite, so for a limited time, they’re offering you a chance to try their Refrigerated Protein Bars for FREE. Just go to perfectsnacks.com/gabby to get a FREE Perfect Bar today.

 

Never lose your edge with the all-new Lexus RX. Experience Amazing at your Lexus dealer.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

 

Please note that this episode may contain paid endorsements and advertisements for products and services. Individuals on the show may have a direct or indirect financial interest in products or services referred to in this episode.

item.title: 5 Solutions for Stress and Anxiety
item.itunes:title: 5 Solutions for Stress and Anxiety
item.description:
Feeling anxious? If the answer is YES, I’m here to help! One of the biggest fears about anxiety is not knowing when it will subside. You can release the fear now by following my 5 solutions for stress and anxiety. When you follow these steps you’ll feel secure and safe knowing that you have tools and a clear path to relief. Plus I reveal an exclusive passage from my new Audible Original, How to Release Anxiety! Press play, and know that anxiety relief is on the way.

How to Release Anxiety is a really special collaboration I cooked up with Audible Originals. In just 90 minutes, you’ll learn how to understand what your anxiety really needs to be set free, soothe yourself in minutes using 5 simple techniques, design a sleep routine to help you get more peaceful rest, and become a grounding presence for everyone around you. https://bit.ly/3EK3sJZ

 

These books will also help you anxiety: The Universe Has Your Back and Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. https://bit.ly/3EKbD9q

 

You can check out my card decks here. https://bit.ly/3S4leea

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources that my team and I put together for you. https://bit.ly/3MCP0FW

 

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Start your credit journey with Chime. Sign up takes only two minutes and doesn’t affect your credit score. Get started at chime.com/gabby

 

Never lose your edge with the all-new Lexus RX. Experience Amazing at your Lexus dealer

 

Produced by Dear Media.

 

Please note that this episode may contain paid endorsements and advertisements for products and services. Individuals on the show may have a direct or indirect financial interest in products or services referred to in this episode.

item.title: Uplevel Your Beliefs to Manifest More
item.itunes:title: Uplevel Your Beliefs to Manifest More
item.description:
Are you doing everything you can to manifest your big dreams—but it’s just not working out? In today’s Dear Gabby I’ll teach you why. This bonus episode is all about believing that you are worthy of your big dreams and desires. In this live talk, I’ll help you recognize the subconscious beliefs that are keeping you stuck and reveal how to uplevel your beliefs TODAY to become a magnet for what you desire.
 

Want to hear another one of my best live talks? How to Release Anxiety is out now! Recorded live, this Audible Original will help you reframe your fears by empowering you to see them differently. https://deargabby.com/releaseanxiety/

 

I’m giving you my two most requested meditations.. And they’re all about manifesting! You’re going to love them. For instant access click here. DearGabby.com/Freemeditations

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3UUQ4bC

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

item.title: Heal Burnout, Release Stress and Get Your Time Back! Big Talk with Marie Forleo
item.description:
On this Dear Gabby, Time Genius creator Marie Forleo shares productivity tips that will help you banish burnout, feel more joy and kickstart your creativity in a major way. Are you constantly stressed, distracted and overwhelmed? Do you believe that hustling this hard is the only way to be productive? If you answered yes to any of these questions, you can’t afford to miss this Big Talk.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode:

Doors are now open for Marie Forleo's Time Genius course. This five-day digital course will teach you how to be joyfully productive on your terms. Click to learn more. Enrollment closes October 13, 2022! DearGabby.com/Marie

 

Want my 2 most requested and impactful meditations? Go to DearGabby.com/Freemeditations for instant access!

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3rjA31n

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

When you want to be a better problem solver, therapy can get you there. Visit BetterHelp.com/deargabby today to get 10% off your first month.

 

For a limited time, get your next purchase of Beyond Collagen® with an exclusive 15% OFF for Dear Gabby listeners only. Simply go to WELIVECONSCIOUS.COM/GABBY, or use promo code GABBY anywhere on the site.

 

Start a new healthy habit today.  Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed's DS-01™ Daily Synbiotic.

item.title: Addiction and How to Overcome It
item.description:
This is the most important Dear Gabby I’ll ever do. I just celebrated 17 years of sobriety, and I have a crucial message for anyone who’s struggling with addiction: You are not alone, and there is a way out. On this show I offer a clear method you can use to overcome addictive patterns by releasing past emotions. I also share tools you can use to get to the root of your addiction. You’ll feel a sense of hope, knowing that my story of recovery can be yours.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

My first-ever Relationship Challenge is underway, and you can still sign up! Doors close on October 5, so THIS IS IT! >>>>Sign up while you still can. DearGabby.com/Relationship

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace will teach you more about IFS therapy and other tools you can use to break free from trauma and addiction. https://bit.ly/3M3xeev

Dear Gabby Episode 76: Spiritual Solutions for Confrontation  https://bit.ly/3EaYGFc

Meditation for Connecting to Your Highest Self  https://bit.ly/3RroJLr

You can find additional mental health resources at this link. https://bit.ly/3UUQ4bC

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional. 

 

Find your new favorite shoes and get ready to be asked “Are those Rothy’s?” Plus, get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

For a limited time, get your next purchase of Beyond Collagen® with an exclusive 15% OFF for Dear Gabby listeners only. Simply go to WELIVECONSCIOUS.COM/GABBY, or use promo code GABBY anywhere on the site.

I just celebrated 17 years of sobriety, and I have a crucial message for anyone who’s struggling with addiction: You are not alone, and there is a way out. On this show I offer a clear method you can use to overcome addictive patterns by releasing past emotions. I also share tools you can use to get to the root of your addiction. You’ll feel a sense of hope, knowing that my story of recovery can be yours.  

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

My first-ever Relationship Challenge is underway, and you can still sign up! Doors close on October 5, so THIS IS IT! >>>>Sign up while you still can. DearGabby.com/Relationship

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace will teach you more about IFS therapy and other tools you can use to break free from trauma and addiction. https://bit.ly/3M3xeev

Dear Gabby Episode 76: Spiritual Solutions for Confrontation  https://bit.ly/3EaYGFc

Meditation for Connecting to Your Highest Self  https://bit.ly/3RroJLr

You can find additional mental health resources at this link. https://bit.ly/3UUQ4bC

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional. 

 

Find your new favorite shoes and get ready to be asked “Are those Rothy’s?” Plus, get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

For a limited time, get your next purchase of Beyond Collagen® with an exclusive 15% OFF for Dear Gabby listeners only. Simply go to WELIVECONSCIOUS.COM/GABBY, or use promo code GABBY anywhere on the site.

 

Never lose your edge with the all-new Lexus RX. Experience Amazing at your Lexus dealer.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: 4 Ways to Feel Connected in a Disconnected World
item.description:
In this bonus episode I’m releasing one of my BEST live talks ever. In it, I teach the most important quality we must cultivate to be a Super Attractor. Plus, you’ll learn the 4 ways to feel more connected in a disconnected world. This show will make you feel empowered and hopeful. You may want to listen to it several times!
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Want more guidance bringing love and connection to every relationship in life? I can guide you every step of the way inside my NEW Relationship Challenge! We start the 14-day challenge on October 1, and doors close on the 5th. If you miss this, you won’t have another chance to join until October of 2023, so SIGN UP NOW! DearGabby.com/Relationship

In my book Judgment Detox, you’ll learn how to release the beliefs that hold you back from living a better life.  https://bit.ly/3SIo6ht

If you need additional support, please check out this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of your commitment to self-care. https://bit.ly/3rjA31n

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

item.title: Dear Gabby, When Is It Time to End a Relationship?
item.description:
Have you ever been tempted to “silently quit” a relationship … or has somebody silently quit on YOU? While it may seem easiest to end a relationship by slowly backing away from someone instead of confronting conflict head-on, this approach creates a whole lot of chaos. On today’s Dear Gabby, I’ll offer a spiritual perspective on how to handle the end of a relationship. If you’re suffering from heartbreak, sensing a change in your relationship, or are uncertain about how to deepen your connections, this episode will serve you greatly.

 

If today’s episode of Dear Gabby served you, I hope you’ll join my Relationship Challenge! Inside, you’ll get 14 days of life-changing lessons that will transform all your relationships. I’ll be your coach every step of the way. The challenge starts on October 

 

If you feel you need more support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here.This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

When you want to be a better problem solver, therapy can get you there. Visit BetterHelp.com/deargabby today to get 10% off your first month.

 

Right now, you can get 15% off this dynamic duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout,

 

Now is a great time to try Thrive Causemetics for yourself! Right now, you can get 15% off your first order when you visit thrivecausemetics.com/gabby

 

Use code GABBY on cymbiotika.com for 15% off sitewide or create your custom bundle and get up to 45% off. (code applies on top of custom bundle discount)

 

Produced by Dear Media.

 

Please note that this episode may contain paid endorsements and advertisements for products and services. Individuals on the show may have a direct or indirect financial interest in products or services referred to in this episode.

item.title: 10 Minute Guided Meditation for Relationships
item.description:
If any of your relationships are causing stress or sadness, this meditation will offer a miraculous shift in perspective! Press play, close your eyes, and listen to my Meditation for Healing Relationships. In less than 10 minutes, I’ll guide you to release resentment and open your heart to forgiveness. When you open your eyes again, you’ll see your relationship through the lens of love.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

You can get additional relationship meditations and SO much more inside my brand new 14-Day Relationship Challenge! It starts on October 1, and you can sign up for it now. https://bit.ly/3R5TIMS

My latest book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, has more spiritual and therapeutic tips you can use to heal your relationships—including the one you have with yourself. https://bit.ly/3r2vacU

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Gabby’s BEST Relationship Advice for Friendships, Romance & More
item.description:
Are you struggling in your relationships? If so, this Dear Gabby is for you! My podcast producer had me answer the top relationship questions Dear Gabby listeners have sent in—and we went DEEP! I share spiritual tips and straight-shooting advice for healing from betrayal, making friends, forgiving family members, interpreting conflicting signs … and so much more! Press play for all my top relationship tips … PLUS get the details on my brand new Relationship Challenge.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode.: 

Want more relationship support beyond today’s episode of Dear Gabby? BIG news: …  I can be your relationship coach with my NEW Relationship Challenge that starts on October 1. Join now to feel calm, confident and connected in all your relationships! https://bit.ly/3Ugxx9x

 

To take my FREE Attachment Style Quiz, click here. In just two minutes, you can get your personalized path to successful relationships. https://bit.ly/3SdvL74

Click here for a list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3xuL7MT

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional. 

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Fuel up for busy days with Splendid Spoon. Get started today and get $120 off your first three boxes at SplendidSpoon.com/GABBY.

item.title: 5 Ways To Start Manifesting the Life You Dream Of
item.description:
At some point or another, many of us put up resistance to manifesting the life we’ve dreamed of—whether we realize it or not. Here’s the good news: I can help you bust through those blocks! On today’s bonus episode of Dear Gabby, I’m sharing a live talk that will help you release anything that’s standing in the way of the happiness you long for. Press play to hear my 5-step guide to manifesting the life you dream of.
 

GET MORE GABBY:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 


In this episode, I talk about forgiveness and feeling more connected to the world. We ALL need more love and connection. That’s why I created my NEW Relationship Challenge. In 14 days, you’ll learn how to release insecurity, set healthy boundaries and open your heart to deeper connection. I really want to be your relationship coach! I hope to see you inside the challenge. DearGabby.com/Relationship

 

 

For more on manifesting, check out my books The Universe Has Your Back and Super Attractor. 


If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. 


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

You can grow thicker, healthier hair AND support our show by going to Nutrafol.com and entering the promo code GABBY to save fifteen dollars off your first month’s subscription.

 

Use code GABBY on cymbiotika.com for 15% off sitewide or create your custom bundle and get up to 45% off (code applies on top of custom bundle discount)

 

Go to Zocdoc.com/GABBY and download the Zocdoc app for FREE. Then start your search for a top-rated doctor today. Many are available within 24 hours.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Stop Taking on Other People’s Energy & Emotions—BIG Talk with Wendy De Rosa
item.description:
Do you ever feel drained by other people’s energy or emotions? This Big Talk with intuitive healer Wendy De Rosa is for you! Wendy will help you stay grounded in your own feelings and thoughts … even if you’re highly sensitive to others’ moods. Whether you have a family member who’s chronically negative or a friend who can be needy, there’s a loving, spiritual way to protect your relationships—and your own energy!
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

Today’s Dear Gabby offers powerful takeaways for how to protect your energy in relationships. Want more of my best relationship tips? Specifically, the 14 spiritual practices that helped me elevate every single relationship in my life, and completely eliminate drama??? Get on the waitlist for my brand NEW Relationship Challenge today and I can be your relationship coach starting October 1! https://bit.ly/3Rwz9dC


Wendy De Rosa is an intuitive energy healer, speaker, teacher and author. Her book, Becoming an Empowered Empath: How to Clear Energy, Set Boundaries & Embody Your Intuition, is a must-read. By opening this book, you will receive the energetic nurturing she has infused into every page.

 

In today’s Dear Gabby, I refer back to a Big Talk with my EMDR therapist Tammy Valicenti. If you’d like to listen to it and learn more about the “window of tolerance,” click here. https://bit.ly/3L2ERkU


If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3x8xBOv


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Right now, you can get 15% off this dynamic duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout

 

Step up your shoes and accessories this summer and get ready to be asked “Are those Rothy’s?” Plus, get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

When you want to be a better problem solver, therapy can get you there. Visit BetterHelp.com/deargabby today to get 10% off your first month.

 

Continue your credit journey with Chime. Sign up takes only two minutes and doesn’t affect your credit score. Get started at chime.com/gabby. 

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: 7 Minute Guided Meditation for Connecting to Your Higher Self
item.description:
I have a gift for you today: It’s a 7-minute meditation that will help the anxious, reactive parts of you relax, so you can let your highest Self take over. Is there a part of you that worries excessively, trying to outsmart the future? Maybe there’s a part that overeats, trying to stuff down big feelings … or a controlling part that’s addicted to work. If you can relate to any of this, you are not alone! Internal Family Systems (IFS) therapy teaches us that we all have “protector” parts working valiantly to keep us safe. But true safety comes when we can help these parts relax. Today’s Dear Gabby offers a beautiful guided meditation that will let you do just that.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

To learn more about IFS, listen to my Dear Gabby BIG TALK with IFS founder Dick Schwartz and my live talk about the Self-to-part connection. https://bit.ly/3xaDQkX

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, I lead a different challenge each quarter to give you a spiritual jumpstart in every area of your life. The membership is easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3L2sy80

If you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3eBdFOb

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Honor Your Addictive Patterns Through IFS
item.description:
Are negative or addictive patterns blocking you from becoming your highest self? Whether it’s self-sabotaging behavior, destructive patterns or chronic fear that’s holding you back, today’s Dear Gabby will free you up to become the person you long to be. In this live talk, I’ll explain how Internal Family Systems (IFS) parts work can help you honor your addictive patterns and experience transformational healing and growth.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver lessons, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, I lead a different challenge each quarter to elevate every area of your life, and the BRAND NEW Relationship Challenge kicks off on October 1! Click here to join the Miracle Membership. https://bit.ly/3CUxsCi

In my newest book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, I write about IFS therapy and parts work in depth. Chapter 7, “Love Every Part,” will be particularly helpful for you. https://bit.ly/3QdvG1O

To learn more about IFS, you can listen to this Dear Gaby Big Talk with IFS founder Dick Schwartz. https://bit.ly/3TEvr2N

In today’s podcast I share about the deep healing that took place when I wrote The Universe Has Your Back. This book has touched countless lives, and I’m so grateful that its lessons have healed others as much as they’ve healed me. https://bit.ly/3xfH5YH

If you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3wTHz6i

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.  

 

Right now, you can get 15% off this dynamic duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout

 

Go to perfectsnacks.com/gabby to get a FREE Perfect Bar today.

 

Use code GABBY on cymbiotika.com for 15% off site-wide or create your custom bundle and get up to 45% off. (code applies on top of custom bundle discount)

item.title: Use this Parenting Advice in All Relationships—BIG TALK with Dr. Becky
item.description:
In this Dear Gabby, you’ll learn the BEST parenting advice … and you can use it in ALL your relationships! Dr. Becky, the clinical psychologist and revered parenting expert, is here to answer burning questions from the Dear Gabby community. (She may answer one of yours!) Whether you’re a parent, a leader, or simply looking to have more confidence in the way you relate to others, this episode is for you.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

Dr. Becky Kennedy is a clinical psychologist, mother of three kids and host of the popular Good Inside with Dr. Becky podcast. She was called the “Millennial parenting whisperer” by Time magazine, and has tips for helping everyone—parents and non-parents alike—feel sturdy in the face of big emotions. You can learn more about her here. I’m so psyched to have her back on the show! 

 

Dr. Becky Kennedy is a clinical psychologist, mother of three kids and host of the popular Good Inside with Dr. Becky podcast. She was called the “Millennial parenting whisperer” by Time magazine, and has tips for helping everyone—parents and non-parents alike—feel sturdy in the face of big emotions. You can learn more about her here and order her newest book here. I’m so psyched to have her back on the show! https://amzn.to/3wIGZIy

If you want to listen to my first Big Talk with Dr. Becky, check it out here. https://bit.ly/3CEmel5

Want an easy way to improve your relationship with your child? Our attachment style affects every relationship in our life—including the one we have with our kids! If you want to learn your attachment style and become a more effective parent and leader, take my free, 2-minute What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz. This will reveal so much about why you behave the way you do as a parent, caretaker or leader … and it will open you up to more love and connection in every area of our life. https://bit.ly/3RfM7vy

In my book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace I share more techniques for caring for your child—and inner child. 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3PShE5U

If you feel you need more support, feel free to explore this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. https://bit.ly/3CRjGjV

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

That’s PERFECTSNACKS.COM/GABBY to get a FREE Perfect Bar today. Happy Snacking!

 

Let Audible help you discover new ways to laugh, be inspired, or be entertained. New members can try it free for 30 days. Visit Audible.com/deargabby or text deargabby to 500-500.

 

Now is a great time to try Thrive Causemetics for yourself!
Right now, you can get 15% off your first order when you visit thrivecausemetics.com/gabby

 

When you want to be a better problem solver, therapy can get you there. Visit BetterHelp.com/deargabby today to get 10% off your first month.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Set Boundaries in a Relationship
item.description:
“Gabby, we want MORE!” After my first Dear Gabby episode on how to set boundaries in a relationship, listeners begged me to keep the conversation going. So in today’s podcast, I’m cutting right to the chase and sharing the one thing you MUST do to create a clear boundary with love. This practice will also help you feel deep compassion for yourself … and live a more heart-centered life.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 
For more guidance on setting boundaries with love, check out this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast. https://bit.ly/3AzwUQH  
 
If you enjoyed this show and you want to learn more about your patterns and needs in relationships, this is my assignment for you: Take my free, 2-minute What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz. You'll get to know a lot more about yourself in minutes … and that will help you take your boundary work to the next level! https://bit.ly/3Azqr8h

Want to uplevel your relationships and ALL areas of your life? I can be your spiritual coach all year long inside the Miracle Membership! It’s time to start living a life beyond your wildest dreams—join the Miracle Membership today! https://bit.ly/3AyOYu0

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. 

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Just Thrive Probiotic and Just Calm make the perfect 1-2 punch to beat stress before it beats you… No fake marketing, no claims, just real, scientifically proven results to help you be the best you. And right now, you can get 15% off this dynamic duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout.

 

Perfect Bar knows it will be love at first bite, so for a limited time, they’re offering you a chance to try their Refrigerated Protein Bars for FREE. All you have to do is go to perfectsnacks.com/gabby to get a FREE Perfect Bar today.

item.title: 3 Steps to Manifesting Love —Big Talk With Jennifer Meyer
item.description:
Today’s Dear Gabby will teach you how to attract love—and have fun while doing it! Jennifer Meyer is not only a high-vibe jewelry designer … She's about to become your spiritual teacher and love coach! In this Big Talk, Jen explains how to turn a divorce or breakup into a beautiful act of love. And, she shares her three-step method for manifesting NEW love. Change is tough, but as Jen says: your hardest days are “when the good sh– starts to happen.” Listen to this and watch the love in your life expand.
 
Jennifer Meyer is the most high-vibe designer on the planet! She infuses her fine-jewelry designs with hearts, evil eyes and good luck charms, so that anyone wearing them feels protected. Follow her on Instagram here. 
 

Get more Gabby:

 

Learning my attachment style is the #1 thing that improved my relationships and helped me attract love—faster than anything else… Take this free quiz to reveal your attachment style. https://bit.ly/3pjQ6eA

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3QIbBBz


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

item.title: Shift Your Energy to Raise Your Vibration
item.description:
In this live talk from 2014, I help you recognize that joy is your superpower—and that you can elevate the whole world by simply raising your own vibration. It can be tough to lean toward loving thoughts. It can even feel selfish! But in this talk, I’ll empower you with clear steps you can take to feel good, exude light—and have a positive impact on your local community and beyond.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

I want to offer you more spiritual support! I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, I lead a different challenge each quarter to help you elevate every area of your life. The NEW Relationship Challenge kicks off October 1! Click here to join the membership. https://bit.ly/3AcOqtK

Want to bring a higher, more confident vibe to your relationships? It all starts with knowing your attachment style. I designed a free, 2-minute What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz to help you unlock yours. https://bit.ly/3STdf5t

For more on how to raise your vibration, check out my book The Universe Has Your Back! https://bit.ly/3bL4AkF

If you feel you need additional support, please consult this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3BUzb9Y

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Perfect Bar knows it will be love at first bite, so for a limited time, they’re offering you a chance to try their Refrigerated Protein Bars for FREE. All you have to do is go to perfectsnacks.com/gabby to get a FREE Perfect Bar today.

 

Exclusively for Dear Gabby listeners, Feel Free Botanic Tonics is offering a 40% off discount on your first purchase just use promo code GABBY at checkout.

 

Go to Zocdoc.com/GABBY and download the Zocdoc app for FREE.

item.title: Spiritual Solutions for Confrontation
item.description:
No matter how spiritual you are, you WILL have to deal with confrontation. Take it from me! An hour before I recorded this Dear Gabby, I was in the midst of a sh*tstorm. This confrontation was the greatest test of my conflict-resolution skills. Using my personal story, I’ll walk you through 8 spiritual steps you can use to turn conflict into connection.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

This episode of Dear Gabby touched on relationships. We covered how to set boundaries with love and how to bring more compassion to people who activate your protector parts. If you want to go deeper with this work and gain a better understanding of your relationship patterns, take my FREE 2-minute What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz. When you understand your attachment style, you can start to undo any patterns that are keeping you stuck in unfulfilling relationships. https://bit.ly/3bBMuS6 

Want more spiritual support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3Qklk0I

 

If you feel you need additional support, please consult this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3bxCKbB

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

We have a special deal for our audience: Get your first visit with an Apostrophe provider for only five dollars at Apostrophe.com/GABBY when you use our code: GABBY.

 

Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/gabby.

item.title: Boundaries and Relationships
item.description:
Do you struggle to set boundaries for yourself? You are not alone! So many people who call in to Dear Gabby have people-pleasing tendencies and override their own needs because they’re afraid of hurting someone else. If this sounds like you, this episode will serve you greatly. I’ll share a 4-step method that will help you set boundaries with love, communicate more clearly, and bust through anxiety and uncertainty in relationships. This really works!
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Do yourself a favor. Set aside 2 minutes to take my FREE What’s Your Attachment Style? quiz. https://bit.ly/3vqKAKV

Want to learn more about attachment styles? Listen to this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast: Transform Your Relationship By Understanding Your Attachment Style https://bit.ly/3PJBosR 

Here are the 4 steps to creating boundaries with love, which I talk about in detail on today’s Dear Gabby. Bookmark this page and come back to this guide anytime you need to set a boundary. This takes practice, so be patient with yourself as you apply these steps. 

Step 1: Center into love. 

Step 2: Get crystal clear on the boundary you want to set, and with whom.

Step 3: Let go of the other person’s reaction. 

Step 4: Be patient. 

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3oD3mLh

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

Exclusively for Dear Gabby listeners, Feel Free Botanic Tonics is offering a 40% off - just use promo code GABBY at checkout.

 

BetterHelp is customized online therapy that offers video, phone, and even live chat sessions with your therapist, so you don’t have to see anyone on camera if you don’t want to. Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

Go to shopify.com/gabby for a FREE fourteen-day trial and get full access to Shopify’s entire suite of features.

 

Right now, you can get 15% off the Just Thrive and Just Calm duo when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout

 

 Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Dear Gabby, How Do I Handle the Fear of the World?
item.description:
Do you feel powerless about what’s going on in the world? This Dear Gabby is for you. This very special episode features my talk with a Polish psychologist who’s determined to help people stay spiritually resilient while witnessing the war in Ukraine. I was honored to answer her questions about how to be the light in times of darkness—whether that darkness is a catastrophic war, a personal loss or a breakup. This episode is packed with powerful techniques for keeping hope alive in yourself and sharing that hope with others.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

Joanna Chmura is a psychologist who names courage as her speciality. Through her individual and group counseling services—and through her Story to Tell podcast—Joanna gives people the support they need to lead courageous lives. You can learn more about my extraordinary new friend here. 

 
In this episode of Dear Gabby, I reference two of my books. The Universe Has Your Back is about transforming fear into faith, and it couldn’t be more relevant for today’s topic. https://bit.ly/3B9lALA

 

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace is for anyone who’s ready to do some deeper work to liberate themselves from trauma. This book delves more into the eight qualities of Self that I touch upon in this episode. It’s also available as an audiobook from Audible. https://bit.ly/3Q5R0Hh


Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new lessons, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, there’s a different 21-day challenge each quarter. The membership’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join.https://bit.ly/3PAJ5BW


If you are in need of safety, recovery or mental health resources, please consult this list. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3ROvMiJ


I intend for this podcast to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Evlo usually offers a 14-day trial but is extending the free trial to 30 days for our listeners with the code GABBY at checkout. Visit evlofitness.com to learn more and try their membership for 30 days with the code GABBY. Workout smarter, not harder.

 

Right now, Hungryroot is offering Dear Gabby listeners 30% off your first delivery and free veggies for life. Just go to Hungryroot.com/GABBY.

 

Ready to shake up your protein Ritual? My listeners get 10% off during your first 3 months at ritual.com/DEARGABBY

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Release Perfectionism to Attract More
item.description:
Does perfectionism get in the way of creating what you want in your life? On today’s Dear Gabby I’ll teach you how to release the need to be perfect so that you can manifest more. This radical shift will create amazing momentum in every area of your life—and I’ll show you how! I’ll teach you to embrace the power of imperfection. When you learn to live this way, you’ll show up for your life with a more positive attitude, higher vibes …. and a whole lot of love.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, I lead a different 21-day challenge each quarter, to help you elevate every area of your life! Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3o4tFJR

 

May Cause Miracles is a 40-day guidebook with subtle shifts that will lead to radical change. It’s the perfect book to accompany this episode and help you deepen your practice of focusing on progress over perfection. https://bit.ly/3Ryp941

 

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace also celebrates progress not perfection. It took years of deep spiritual and therapeutic work to wake up every day without anxiety—and it was worth the journey! The book is filled with actionable tools you can use to overcome your fears, too. I hope you’ll take the Happy Days journey with me. You can pick up a copy of the book here or grab the audiobook here. https://bit.ly/3uRXdOG

 

For more information on EMDR therapy, listen to my interview with my own EMDR therapist, Tammy Valicenti. https://bit.ly/3AUkumM

 

If you feel you need additional support, please check out this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3OdrH4m

 

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

Your new favorite shoes are waiting. Discover the versatile styles you can wear absolutely anywhere and get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

Evlo usually offers a 14-day trial but is extending the free trial to 30 days for our listeners with the code GABBY at checkout. Visit evlofitness.com to learn more and try their membership for 30 days with the code GABBY. Workout smarter, not harder.

 

Visit athleticgreens.com/gabby to take ownership over your health and pick up the ultimate daily nutritional insurance!

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: 4 Ways to Boost Your Confidence
item.description:
Do you think you have to be perfect to be confident? Think again! In this bonus episode of Dear Gabby I’m sharing a live talk on confidence. It will help you to stop trying to be perfect and manifest more by just being YOU. I’ll help you see and appreciate yourself for everything you are, express your authentic truth and never, ever sweat the small stuff.

 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3PdqImm

In this talk I reference my new book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. This is the most important book I’ve written to date, and I hope you’ll read it, if you haven’t already taken the Happy Days journey.  This audiobook is now available too. https://bit.ly/3ILLDKH

If you’ve ever been curious about becoming a health coach or a wellness entrepreneur; if you've been frustrated by some Western medicine options in the past; or if you just want to do a deep dive into your own well-being, the Institute for Integrative Nutrition offers an online training program that could be a great place to start! 

To access a free online sample class and learn more about their current special offer, including how you can save up to 35% on tuition, visit this link. As a Dear Gabby listener, you’ll also receive a bonus gift package when you enroll. http://www.deargabby.com/iin

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3yJFLwQ

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

Stay well fueled this summer with Splendid Spoon. Get started today and save on an entire week of ready-made, plant-based meals. Just go to SplendidSpoon.com/GABBY for $50 off your first box when you subscribe.

 

Exclusively for Dear Gabby listeners, Feel Free Botanic Tonics is offering a 40% off discount on your first purchase just use promo code GABBY at checkout.

item.title: Stuck in Fight, Flight or Freeze Mode? Here’s How to Escape It—Big Talk with “The Holistic Psychologist” Nicole LePera
item.description:
The more we know about psychology, the more we can heal. So why the f— is it so hard to understand? On today’s Dear Gabby, “The Holistic Psychologist” Nicole LePera takes clinical, psychological concepts and makes them easy to digest—so you can understand what’s happening to YOU. She shares actionable tips for settling your nervous system, confronting shame and embracing new habits to create lasting change. 
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 


On today’s episode of the Dear Gabby podcast we are joined by Nicole LePera, who’s known as “The Holistic Psychologist” on Instagram. In her SelfHealers Circle, Nicole facilitates self-led healing journeys, opening space for people to escape old patterns and create real change. Make sure to check out her new book, How to Do the Work.


Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, and community connection, along with a different challenge each quarter. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3c0Uko0 


In today's Dear Gabby I mention my new book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. In this book, I share my story of trauma recovery, along with several exercises for self-soothing. It is my mission to get this book into as many hands as possible. If you’ve read it, I hope you’ll share your copy with a friend or get them the audiobook. And if you’ve yet to take the guided path toward inner peace, this is your heartfelt invitation to take the journey with me. I’ll meet you on page one. https://bit.ly/3uySEJ2

 

For more on soothing your children (and yourself), listen to this Dear Gabby Big Talk with Dr. Becky. https://bit.ly/3c0AlGe


You can also find tips for parenting your child and your inner child on this Dear Gabby Big Talk with Dan Siegel. https://bit.ly/3angxfA


In today's episode I also talk about attachment styles. To hear more about what attachment styles are, when they form, and how your attachment style affects your behavior, check out this episode of Dear Gabby. https://bit.ly/3yRhAxL


If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3nQYlhM


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

 

Evlo usually offers a 14-day trial but is extending the free trial to 30 days for our listeners with the code GABBY at checkout. Visit evlofitness.com to learn more and try their membership for 30 days with the code GABBY. Workout smarter, not harder.

 

Go to shopify.com/gabby for a FREE fourteen-day trial and get full access to Shopify’s entire suite of features.

 

Start a new healthy habit today.  Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed's DS-01™ Daily Synbiotic.

 

Right now, when you go to heyfavor.com/GABBY, Favor is offering a $10 donation to Bedsider.org for every Dear Gabby listener who becomes a patient. Your donation will help low-income individuals get access to birth control through Bedsider.org

item.title: How I Freed My Body from Trauma: The Untold Story from Happy Days
item.description:
Trauma doesn’t only affect our mind. We all have emotional disturbances that can get frozen in our body, manifesting as back pain, a locked jaw, etc. But when we can uncover the feelings beneath the physical pain, we can free what’s frozen—and experience great physical and emotional relief. Listen to this episode of Dear Gabby to hear more on this topic, and to hear me read the missing story from Happy Days.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 


The story I share on today’s Episode of the Dear Gabby podcast is from my latest book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. If you’ve read the book, you can revisit Chapter 8 to revisit the lesson about freeing what’s been frozen in your body and mind. And if you haven’t read Happy Days yet, consider this a sign! This is your openhearted invite to take the journey toward inner peace with me. I’ll guide you every step of the way, and open you up to body-based therapies and more. https://bit.ly/3y4ZPtk


If you’re interested in learning more about EMDR therapy, check out my Big Talk with my EMDR therapist, Tammy Valicenti. Tammy has a beautiful ability to demystify this life-changing technique, and she shares instructions for finding an EMDR practitioner near you. https://bit.ly/3bD8Kut


I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations and community connection. Plus, you’ll get access to hundreds of hours of content about manifesting, abundance and more. Take your spiritual practice to the next level and sign up for the Miracle Membership! https://bit.ly/3yzJP3Q


You can find a link to the binaural-beats playlist that I reference in this episode here. 


If you feel you need additional support, please consult this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3nxpOVn

item.content:encoded:
Trauma doesn’t only affect our mind. We all have emotional disturbances that can get frozen in our body, manifesting as back pain, a locked jaw, etc. But when we can uncover the feelings beneath the physical pain, we can free what’s frozen—and experience great physical and emotional relief. Listen to this episode of Dear Gabby to hear more on this topic, and to hear me read the missing story from Happy Days.  

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode:

item.title: How to Heal Childhood Wounds and Reparent Yourself— Big Talk with Dr. Dan Siegel
item.description:
On today’s Dear Gabby, you’ll learn how to overcome childhood wounds and soothe and care for yourself as an adult. I’m sitting down with the revered psychiatrist Dr. Dan Siegel. Dr. Siegel’s books have miraculously shifted my relationship with my son—and my relationship with myself. Today’s podcast will teach you how to reparent yourself.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

My guest on today’s Dear Gabby is Dr. Dan Siegel! Dr Siegel is a clinical professor of psychiatry at the UCLA School of Medicine and executive director of the Mindsight Institute. He’s co-authored some of my favorite parenting books, including No-Drama Discipline: The Whole-Brain Way to Calm the Chaos and Nurture Your Child’s Developing Mind and The Power of Showing Up: How Parental Presence Shapes Who Our Kids Become and How Their Brains Get Wired. To learn more about Dr. Siegel’s work, visit his website. 

 

Want more coaching from me? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Now is the best time to join because the brand new Body Love Challenge kicks off on July 1, and it’s exclusively available to Miracle Members! Click here to join the membership and get 21 proven ways to feel peaceful, safe and free in your body. https://bit.ly/3blwlQ9

 

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace is my story of reparenting myself. In the book, I explain how I learned to let Self lead my inner system. https://bit.ly/3HPJJYW

 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/39Qls8J

 

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

Your new favorite shoes are waiting. Discover the versatile styles you can wear absolutely anywhere and get $20off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY. 

 

Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase of AG1. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/gabby.

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering an exclusive offer of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Visit evlofitness.com to learn more and try their membership for 30 days with the code GABBY. Workout smarter, not harder.

 

Save fifteen dollars off your first visit with an Apostrophe provider at Apostrophe.com/GABBY when you use our code: GABBY.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Love Your Body
item.description:
Do you ever attack your body with unloving thoughts or actions? In this bonus episode of Dear Gabby, I’m sharing my live talk on developing a loving and spiritual relationship with your body. I’ll guide you to witness the ways in which you could be abusing your body with negative thoughts or behaviors. Then, I’ll teach you the simple mindset shift that will miraculously transform the way you see your body—and your whole being.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 


Want more coaching from me? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, and so much more. And this is the best time to join! We kick off the Body Love Challenge on July 1. This challenge is like nothing I’ve ever done before, and it will radically transform your relationship with your body. You don’t want to miss it! Click here to join.https://bit.ly/3nb985M


In this episode of Dear Gabby, I reference my New York Times  bestseller May Cause Miracles. This book will teach you how to shift your thoughts to experience miraculous change in all areas of your life, including the way that you perceive your body. https://bit.ly/3Obuxb3


My newest book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace shares the story of how I recovered from trauma using spiritual and therapeutic tools. I used several body-based healing practices on my journey to freedom and peace. If you’re interested in this topic, check out Chapter 7, “Hiding Behind the Body.” https://bit.ly/3yeiT9K


If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here! https://bit.ly/3xTblYu


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

Go to WHOOP.com and use code GABBY at checkout to save 15% today.

 

Start a new healthy habit today.  Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed's DS-01™ Daily Synbiotic.  

 

Exclusively for Dear Gabby listeners, Feel Free Botanic Tonics is offering a 40% off discount on your first purchase - just use promo code GABBY at checkout.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Tell the Truth: A Spiritual Guide to Radical Honesty
item.description:
Today’s Dear Gabby tackles a BIG topic: How to tell the truth! Did you know that there’s a way to be radically honest, have difficult conversations AND remain calm and compassionate? Follow Gabby’s guidance for telling the truth in a way that will elevate your relationships and make you a far more effective communicator.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 


Want more of my coaching? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice that you can stick to. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations and so much more. Plus, Miracle Members have access to my archives, which has hundreds of hours of content. AND I’ll take you through a 21-day challenge each quarter! On July 1, I’m kicking off my BRAND NEW Body Love Challenge. It’s exclusively available to Miracle Members, and you do not want to miss this. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3QpUiG4


If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3NYtEmf


On this episode of the Dear Gabby Podcast, I referenced the Spirit Junkie Masterclass. This is the ultimate 8-week training on how to confidently pursue your passion. I’ll teach you how to get crystal clear on your purpose and infuse spirituality into whatever kind of work you do in the world. (I’ve trained everyone from lawyers to health coaches and spiritual teachers!) Register now. https://bit.ly/3NYhFVr


On today’s episode of Dear Gabby, I mentioned two of my books. The Universe Has Your Back shares my methods for tapping into spiritual guidance. And in Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, I offer support to help you feel safe as you tap into your truth. 


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

 

Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

Sign up today at butcherbox.com/GABBY and use code GABBY to get 1 pack of free bacon in EVERY box for the life of your membership PLUS $10 off your first order.

https://justthrivehealth.com/discount/Gabby

item.title: How to Tell The Universe What You Want & Manifest Your Desires
item.description:
This episode of the Dear Gabby podcast will teach you how to communicate with the Universe so you can manifest exactly what you desire! The KEY to manifesting is to become clear on what you want—and this is a step that many people overlook. Press play. I’ll help you get crystal-clear on your desires and manifest with ease.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership so I can be your spiritual coach! On Dear Gabby I get to coach people on all kinds of topics. Inside the membership, I  take that coaching to the next level. Members get weekly lessons, meditations, community support, and an awesome challenge each quarter! Now is a better time to join than ever, because my 21-Day Body Love Challenge is coming up in July. It’s exclusively available to members, so you’ll have to join if you want in. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3tpWQKj

In this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I reference three of my books. Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, shows the profound impact of putting your own recovery first. When you do this, your life can become a happy dream—and I mean that. I also talk about two of my best books for manifesting: Super Attractor and The Universe Has Your Back! 

If you need more support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3NJjvtd

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

item.title: How to Process Unresolved Memories & Emotions with EMDR
item.description:
My EMDR therapist Tammy Valicenti is with me on today’s episode of the Dear Gabby podcast! What’s EMDR? Just press play!  I wanted Tammy to demystify the profound healing tool that has changed my life—and she delivered! Listen in and learn how EMDR can bring major relief to your body and mind … and even help you manifest. Plus, where to find an EMDR therapist near you.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 


In my book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, I share more about my journey with EMDR therapy. I also provide candid details on the other tools—both spiritual and therapeutic—that helped me recover from trauma. Today, my life is a happy dream. And if I can reach this place, so can you. I’d be honored to guide you down the path to profound freedom and inner peace. And if you’ve already read the book, please leave a review! I’d love to hear your honest thoughts. https://bit.ly/391PK8b


If you feel that you need more support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. It includes a link to the EMDR International Association Page, so you can find an EMDR therapist near you. https://bit.ly/38Q5bjE


Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3mcyKyR


Want to hear my EMDR playlist? Cue it up here! You can use this music to help you meditate and to help you manifest. 


This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

item.title: How to Know You’re Hearing Spiritual Guidance
item.description:
“How do I know if it’s my intuition … or my fear?” I’ve been getting some version of this question for decades! And on this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I’m going to set the record straight once and for all. Press play to learn how to know when your inner guide is trying to communicate with you … and when it’s your fear holding you back.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode.

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3lHpXVt 

If you feel you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3yZxNSc

If you want to read more about connecting with your spirit guides, I have two book recommendations for you. Super Attractor and The Universe Has Your Back are both packed with methods for getting aligned with your own inner guidance system and tapping into the voice of your spirit guides. 

In this episode, I also refer to my book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. As I told a caller on today’s show, Happy Days can help you feel more settled in your own internal system, which will help you feel more confident and settled in every area of your life—including relationships! https://bit.ly/38oFZAA

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Your new favorite shoes are waiting. Discover the versatile styles you can wear absolutely anywhere and get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY. 

 

Get unlimited access to EVERY MasterClass, and as a Dear Gabby listener, you get 15% off an annual membership! Go to masterclass.com/gabby

 

Now is a great time to try Thrive Causemetics for yourself! Right now, you can get 15% off your first order when you visit thrivecausemetics.com/gabby

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering an exclusive offer of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

item.title: The MOST crucial step to Manifesting Your Big Dreams
item.description:
Today’s Dear Gabby podcast is a MAJOR lesson in manifesting—and it’s the step that most people miss. People always balk when I suggest this step, but little do they know that it’s the secret to manifesting! Listen to this episode all the way through and you’ll learn the method—and become a magnet for all your desires.
 
The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

In this episode of Dear Gabby, I mention the Spiritually Aligned Action Method. There’s a whole chapter on this in my book Super Attractor: Methods for Manifesting a Life Beyond Your Wildest Dreams. I also cite an exercise from The Universe Has Your Back. These are two of the BEST books on manifesting, if I do say so myself! bit.ly/3luaacg

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/39GcQkF

For safety, recovery and mental health resources, please click here. My team and I put the list together to give you additional support if you need it. I am so proud of you for being here, and am sending all my love to you on your journey to recovery. https://bit.ly/3wB6vPb
