item.title: Do You Have Adult Tantrums? How To Soothe Yourself And Your Kids—With Dr. Becky
item.description:
Whether you’re a parent or a caregiver, the #1 thing you MUST do to help the children in your life is care for your own well-being. As the mother of a toddler, I’ve seen firsthand how important my personal growth work is to being a great mom. That’s why I couldn’t wait to sit down with clinical psychologist Dr. Becky Kennedy! In this episode, Dr. Becky offers revolutionary tips for parenting with more compassion and less guilt. But these tips won’t just help you care for your kids … they will transform the way you soothe and support yourself.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Enrollment for the Bestseller Masterclass is open until May 18, 2022! If you have a book in you—or an idea for one—now’s your chance to fulfill your calling and create a bestseller. The best part is, you can learn every aspect of writing, publishing and marketing your book from the comfort of your own home. (Slippers encouraged.) Learn more here. https://bit.ly/3yBfbHL

Dr. Becky Kennedy is a clinical psychologist, mother of three kids, and host of the popular Good Inside with Dr. Becky podcast. She was called the “Millennial parenting whisperer” by Time Magazine, and has tips for helping everyone—parents and non-parents alike—feel sturdy in the face of big emotions. You can learn more about her here. I’m so psyched to have her on my show today! https://bit.ly/3l9Vm2E

If you’re interested in learning more about IFS therapy, check out my Big Talk with IFS founder Dick Schwartz.  https://bit.ly/3MdlHbW

Want weekly coaching practices from me? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/38nC07o

If you feel you need additional support, please consult my go-to list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3wceeEp

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

For a limited time, get 15% off sitewide when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout. Thats https://justthrivehealth.com/discount/Gabby

 

Your calm is your power, friends. To find yours go to moonjuice.com/Gabby and use code GABBY at checkout for 20% off.

 

Go to Hapbee.com/gabby to save 25 percent on your order.

 

Go to grammarly.com/DEARGABBY to sign up for a free account! And when you’re ready to upgrade to Grammarly Premium, get 20% off for being my listener.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Stop Doubting Your Creative Calling
item.description:
On this episode of Dear Gabby, I’m sharing my creative process for all the projects that I bring forth, ranging from books to talks to social media posts! Follow my guidance for tapping into the creativity that’s within you and find the confidence to fearlessly express your art — no matter what you want to create! (I also have some awesome tips for avoiding burnout.)
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 


Want to learn my secrets for writing and marketing your bestselling book? Sign up for my free live training: 4 Secrets to Your Bestselling Book. During two live training sessions on May 11, I’m dropping some major insider scoop on the book-writing process. Click here to sign up for your spot: Training sessions are at 1 p.m. and 8 p.m. ET! https://bit.ly/3wabia3

 

My latest book Happy Days is my most important spiritual work to date. In the book, I share intimate details of my journey through trauma recovery, and I reveal the spiritual and therapeutic tools that I used to find profound freedom and inner peace. This book has the potential to serve you in many ways, and it can help you find the confidence and courage you need to express yourself authentically. https://bit.ly/3kPu29s


Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3KLFCgl


If you feel you need additional support, please consult this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3KOTTZN
 
 
This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp andDear Gabby listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby
 
 
Head over to nutrisense.io/gabby and use code "gabby" for $30 off any subscription to the CGM program
 
 
Your calm is your power, friends.To find yours go to moonjuice.com/Gabby and use code GABBY at checkout for 20% off

Press play to learn how to bust through what’s blocking the light within you, step into your power as a miracle worker, and confidently share your message with the world!

item.title: Dear Gabby, How Can I Care for My Mental Health?
item.description:
It’s Mental Health Awareness Month, and this episode of Dear Gabby is all about mental health. I’ll teach you how to care for your inner world, calm your nervous system and be resilient in the midst of discomfort. If you’re facing mental health issues of any kind, press play. You’ll hear me get very personal about my own journey with depression and anxiety, so you can know that you’re not alone.
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

In this episode, I reference my new book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. This book tells the story of my own healing journey, and in it I share the spiritual, therapeutic and medical tools I used to heal my own mental health. https://bit.ly/3MG9JHl

If you feel that you need additional support, please refer to my list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. Support is available to you, and I’m proud of you for being here. 

To learn more about Somatic Experiencing, check out Episode #56 of the Dear Gabby podcast. It’s a chat with Dave Berger, who’s a leader in the field. https://bit.ly/39qzLAj

You can learn more about IFS therapy in Episode #19 of the Dear Gabby podcast. This is a Big Talk with IFS founder Dick Schwartz. https://bit.ly/38vLUU0

This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey toward inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological or medical conditions, please seek help from a qualified health professional.

 

Head over to nutrisense.io/gabby and use code "gabby" for $30 off any subscription to the CGM program. 

 

Try Splendid Spoon today and take meal-planning off your plate. Just go to SplendidSpoon.com/gabby for $50 off your first box when you subscribe to the Breakfast, Lunch and Reset plan, OR the Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner and Reset plan. 

 

For a limited time, get 15% off site wide when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout or visit https://justthrivehealth.com/discount/Gabby

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Transform Your Relationships by Understanding Your Attachment Style
item.description:
Knowing your attachment style is the key to finding freedom, connection and support in all of your relationships — including the one you have with yourself. If you’re stuck in old patterns and feel held back from truly satisfying relationships, press play! You’ll learn whether you have an “anxious,” “avoidant” or “secure” attachment style, and how you can use this awareness to elevate every relationship in your life!
 
The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

If you want to discover your attachment style AND get crystal-clear direction on how to find deep fulfillment in all of your relationships, carve out two minutes! That’s all the time you need and take my free “What’s Your Attachment Style?” quiz. https://bit.ly/3rlbthb

In my latest book Happy Days, I share tools that you can use to find a deeper sense of security in all your relationships. This book is a guided path from trauma to profound freedom and inner peace. I pray that it lands in the hands of anyone who needs it. https://bit.ly/37j5Uc6

Want more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/38BgrQg


If you need additional support or are seeking a trauma therapist near you, please check out my list of Mental Health Resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3E5Mt2s
 
 
This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.
 
 
 
PARTNERS
 

When you’re wearing Rothy’s, your footprint feels lighter than ever. Get $20 off your first purchase today at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

I highly recommend you check it out. Get unlimited access to EVERY MasterClass, and as a Dear Gabby listener, you get 15% off an annual membership! Go to MASTERCLASS.COM/GABBY

 

Say goodbye to generic hair care for good. today. Go to FunctionofBeauty.com/GABBY to take your Hair Goals quiz, and you’ll save 25% on your first order.

 

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

item.title: The Mind-Body Therapy That Changed My Life
item.description:
Somatic Experiencing (SE) is a profound healing tool. This mind-body therapy has freed my body from trauma—and that, my friend, is a miracle! I wanted to demystify SE for you, so I called in an expert. Today’s Big Talk with renowned SE practitioner Dave Berger is a beautiful overview of a practice that can help you heal emotional wounds, regulate your nervous system and lower your stress levels.
 
RESOURCES:
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Meditation is a powerful way to calm your thoughts and your body. I’d love to send you two of my favorite meditations for free. Sign up here to have them delivered to your inbox. https://bit.ly/35tjSax

In my new book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, I share the 9 spiritual and therapeutic tools that helped me survive and thrive after trauma. In Chapter 8, “Freeing What’s Frozen,” I dive into my experience with SE.

Dave Berger is a somatic psychotherapist, physical therapist and bodyworker. You can learn more about him and his diverse array of practices here. 

In this episode of the podcast, I reference a video of Peter Levine, PhD, working with a war veteran to resolve a trauma-induced tic. If you’d like to watch the video, you can do so here. 

To learn more about somatic experiencing, and to find a list of practitioners, visit TraumaHealing.org. 

You can find additional information about somatic experiencing at SomaticExperiencing.com. 

To find more support, including a trauma therapist near you, please visit this list of safety, recovery and mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3NP8Gqj


Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, spiritual exercises, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/38k4GxF 
 
Hi there! Gabby here. This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.
 
 
PARTNERS: 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering an exclusive offer of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Give Hapbee a try and you’re going to love it as much as I do! Order today and you’ll save 25 percent and get 30-days free access to ALL their Signals!  Go to Hapbee.com/gabby.

 

Check out Sunday - full-season plans start at just $129, and you can get 20% off at checkout when you visit GETSUNDAY.COM/GABBY!

 

Start a new healthy habit today.  Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed's DS-01™ Daily Synbiotic

 

Hi there! Gabby here. This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

item.title: Dear Gabby, Can My Spiritual Practice Relieve Physical Pain?
item.description:
People struggle so much with physical pain—I know this firsthand! In my own journey with pain, I’ve found great relief using mind-body techniques. In this episode of Dear Gabby, I’ll guide you to consider that there’s more to your pain than just bodily conditions. And I’ll teach you how to bring your spiritual practice into relieving any discomfort you feel.
 
RESOURCES: 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join.  https://bit.ly/3usOXUb

In this episode of Dear Gabby, I refer to my new book, Happy Days. The entire book is intended to soothe and settle your nervous system. Chapter 4, in particular, which is called “Hiding Behind the Body,” focuses on the mind-body soothing practices I cover on the podcast today. https://bit.ly/3IHdZUA

Head to my Happy Days Resources page to find the bilateral-beats playlist I created! This will help you with the Rage on the Page exercise I mentioned in this episode of Dear Gabby. https://bit.ly/386YrgF

Here are some of my favorite positive affirmations for soothing the body. You may want to print these out, so that you can use them regularly.

I'm safe in my body. Everything is working out for me.

I am truly taken care of.

I am at ease. I am free in my mind and body. 

I can let go and trust that everything is working out for me. 

My presence is my power. 

My energy has the power to be restored. 

My body is strong and resilient. 

I am still, I am well. 

If you feel that you need additional support, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here! https://bit.ly/3qAMwOc
 
 
Hi there! Gabby here. This podcast is intended to educate, inspire and support you on your personal journey towards inner peace. I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.
 
 
PARTNERS
 

Head over to nutrisense.io/gabby and use code "gabby" for $30 off any subscription to the CGM program.

 

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Dear Gabby listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

For a limited time, get 15% off sitewide when you go to JustThriveHealth.com and use code: GABBY at checkout

 

Sign up at ButcherBox.com/GABBY and get 2 lbs of ground beef free in every order for the life of your membership.

item.title: How to Tap Into Your Psychic Abilities & Establish a Direct Line to Spirit
item.description:
Have you ever wanted to sit down with a psychic medium, ask them what it feels like to channel spirits — and teach you to channel, too? If so, this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast is for you! I’m chatting with the psychic medium (and my bestie!) MaryAnn DiMarco. Listen in and learn how to tap into your natural psychic abilities and connect with your spirit guides.

 

RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

MaryAnn DiMarco is a gifted psychic medium, intuitive counselor and spiritual teacher. I love her new book Medium Mentor so much, I wrote the forward for it! MaryAnn has been my personal medium mentor, and I can attest to the beautiful ability she has to help others hone their intuitive gifts. Click here to order the book!

If you want more guidance on forming a deep connection with your spirit guides, check out my book Super Attractor! This book will help you know — without a doubt — that spirit is with you at all times. https://bit.ly/36bYEP3

I just launched my 9th book! Happy Days is my most profound spiritual work yet, and it will give you the guided path from trauma to profound freedom and inner peace. I believe that spirit works through many things — including books — and it’s my sincerest hope that Happy Days lands in the hands of anyone who needs it. https://bit.ly/3JA2fVh

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3L4Hlhl

If you feel that you need more support, or information on where to find a trauma therapist near you, please check out this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/36ku0mr

I am not a psychologist or a medical doctor and do not offer any professional health or medical advice. If you are suffering from any psychological  or medical conditions, please seek help from  a qualified health professional.

 

PARTNERS

item.title: The #1 Way to Chill the Eff Out!
item.description:
On today’s Dear Gabby, I’m sharing my #1 Secret to Success! What’s the secret? Meditation… In this episode I’m breaking down my favorite meditations. These practices have saved my life. Meditation has helped me stay sober, overcome trauma and manifest the life of my dreams. And I promise: No matter what you’re going through, meditation can help you too! Tune in and learn how to start a daily practice that will change your life.
 
RESOURCES:

The 2022 Meditation Challenge starts on April 1! This is one of the most joyful things I do with the spirit-junkie community each year … Come along for the ride! I’ll be your manifesting coach for 21 days that will calm your energy, focus your mind, and make you magnet for miracles! Join now!. https://bit.ly/3wzvmoj

In this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I referenced a bodywork practice from my new book Happy Days. In this book, I share the nine spiritual and therapeutic tools that helped me survive and thrive after trauma … and find more freedom and inner peace than I ever thought possible. https://bit.ly/3tkan6O


If you need additional support, including information on where to find a trauma therapist near you, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3ucNbGy
 
PARTNERS
 

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Dear Gabby listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

Go to https://www.magicmind.co/gabby and use my discount code GABBY at checkout

 

Start a new healthy habit today. Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed’s Daily Synbiotic.

 

Right now, Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to ModernFertility.com/gabby.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

Tune in and learn how to start a daily practice that will change your life.   RESOURCES:

The 2022 Meditation Challenge starts on April 1! This is one of the most joyful things I do with the spirit-junkie community each year … Come along for the ride! I’ll be your manifesting coach for 21 days that will calm your energy, focus your mind, and make you magnet for miracles! Join now!. https://bit.ly/3wzvmoj

In this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I referenced a bodywork practice from my new book Happy Days. In this book, I share the nine spiritual and therapeutic tools that helped me survive and thrive after trauma … and find more freedom and inner peace than I ever thought possible. https://bit.ly/3tkan6O

If you need additional support, including information on where to find a trauma therapist near you, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3ucNbGy   PARTNERS  

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Dear Gabby listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

Go to https://www.magicmind.co/gabby and use my discount code GABBY at checkout

item.title: How to Connect to the Spiritual Realm and the Guidance Around You - Big Talk with Martha Beck
item.description:
Martha Beck, the world-renowned author and life coach, is my guest on today’s episode of the Dear Gabby podcast. Before we started recording, Martha said to me: “I love just diving into conversations about spirituality.” So, buckle up! Our Big Talk  dove right into integrity, spirituality, trauma-recovery, and manifesting … and, it will help you tune into the spiritual guidance that’s all around you.
 
 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

My meditation practice has always helped me feel connected to the spiritual guidance that’s within me and around me. Whether you’re new to meditation or an experienced meditator, I’d love to give you my favorite practices for shifting my energy and feeling spiritually connected. To claim 2 free meditations, click here. https://bit.ly/3tUzRXo. 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join.  https://bit.ly/3J87vzo

Happy Days is my most vulnerable and personal book yet. In it, I share the 9 spiritual and therapeutic tools that helped me become not only a trauma survivor, but a thriver. If you feel called to read this book, my prayer is that it brings you great comfort and healing — and a deep knowing that you are not alone. https://bit.ly/3J4U2Z5

About Martha Beck: Martha Beck, PhD, is a world-renowned life coach. She’s a Harvard-trained sociologist, a nine-time author, and a highly sought after life coach and speaker. Her most recent book is The Way of Integrity. 

The 2022 Meditation Challenge starts on April 1! If you’d like to join me for 21 days of meditations that will calm your energy, help you feel connected and elevate every area of your life, join the waitlist now! I’ll help you make meditation a habit. https://bit.ly/3KEabVO

In this episode of The Dear Gabby podcast, I refer to a previous episode that features an interview with Richard Schwartz, the founder of Internal Family Systems (IFS) therapy. If you’d like to learn more about IFS, check out my Big Talk with Richard!  https://bit.ly/34IocSS

 

If you need additional support, or are looking for a trauma therapist near you, please refer to this list of  mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3i3xyM2
 
 
PARTNERS
 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering an exclusive offer of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby

 

Step up your shoes and accessories this spring and get ready to be asked “Are those Rothy’s?” Plus, get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

Find Lumineux on Amazon.com and get seven dollars off today!

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Take Care of Your Energy in Times of Crisis
item.description:
How can we stay present with the world news and still feel good? And how can we feel joy when others are suffering all around us … and not feel guilty about it?  We turn on the TV or pick up our phones, and the news of the day takes us out. So if you’re feeling powerless today, this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast is for you.
 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/378BGIt

The 2022 Meditation Challenge starts on April 1. I designed this 21-day challenge to help you turn meditation into a daily habit that you can use throughout your life. With this practice you’ll feel inspired, connected and peaceful. Sign up here. https://bit.ly/3MCcr1C

My new book Happy Days is my most important spiritual work yet. In it, I share the 9 spiritual and therapeutic tools that I used to overcome trauma — and not only survive, but thrive. No matter what you’ve been through in your life, my hope is that this book will help you find clarity and peace. If you’ve been on this planet for the past couple of years, you’ve survived trauma of some sort. Now, I want to help you thrive. deargabby.com/happydays


If you need additional support, including where to find a trauma therapist near you, please refer to this list of mental health resources. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3tGM4yN
 
 
PARTNERS:
 

This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Dear Gabby listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/deargabby.

 

Go to grammarly.com/DEARGABBY to sign up for a free account! And when you’re ready to upgrade to Grammarly Premium, get 20% off for being my listener.

 

Start a new healthy habit today. Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed’s Daily Synbiotic.

 

You can shop Stripe and Stare on their website www.stripeandstare.com with an exclusive Dear Gabby code – GABBY for 20% off their range. Available at major retailers such as Revolve, Bloomingdales and Shopbop.

item.title: 3 Manifesting Tips for Your Career
item.description:
If I’d known in my 20s what I know now, my path to becoming a spiritual entrepreneur would have been a little bit different …. and a lot more fun! In this episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I share my top three tips for manifesting your dream career. Take notes: These lessons apply to any calling or career path.
 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

In this episode of Dear Gabby, I reference my beautiful PDF download: “10 Ways to Succeed as a Spiritual Entrepreneur.” I cannot overemphasize the power of the practices in this PDF! You can download it here. https://bit.ly/345j0bz

My new book Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, is my most spiritual work yet. This book shares the 9 spiritual and therapeutic tools I used to overcome anxiety and find my own happy days. I also address workaholism — which I touch on in today’s episode of Dear Gabby. I hope this book serves you. https://bit.ly/3MpUNhw

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new lessons, guided meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join.https://bit.ly/3vx7Zem

 
 
MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:

If you’re looking for additional assistance with safety, recovery, or mental health, please refer to this list of resources that my team and I put together for you. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3Izjfuw

 

 

PARTNERS:

 

To start building your wealth, and get your first $5,000 managed for FREE, for life, go to wealthfront.com/gabby

 

Ready to shake up your protein Ritual? My listeners get 10% off during your first 3 months at ritual.com/DEARGABBY.

 

Say goodbye to generic hair care for good. today. Go to FunctionofBeauty.com/GABBY to take your Hair Goals quiz, and you’ll save 25% on your first order.

 

To keep the new year positivity going, Audible has created a destination for complete well-being that delivers inspiration, encouragement, and actionable steps—not matter what your goals are. Go to audible.com/wellbeing.

item.title: The First Step to Feeling Free From The Past
item.description:
Happy Days is my most important spiritual book yet. On this special episode of the Dear Gabby Podcast, I share the intro and the first chapter of my powerful new book about finding freedom on the other side of fear. Happy Days is your path to deep inner peace. It’s not an easy path, but it leads to miracles — and that’s a promise. Enjoy this preview.
 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace is out now! This is my greatest spiritual work yet. This book is a journey toward lifelong transformation, and I guide you closer to freedom and peace with every page. I’ve infused each word of this book with love, and it’s my privilege to share it with you. DearGabby.com/HappyDays or https://bit.ly/3rSZ0lo

Get the Happy Days Audible audiobook here: audible.com/HappyDays. 

 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. deargabby.com/miraclemembership or https://bit.ly/3oUU8ui 
 
MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:
If you need additional support or want to find a trauma therapist near you, please refer to this list of mental health resources. DearGabby.com/emergency-resources-2

item.title: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom & Inner Peace
item.description:
This is a very important episode of the Dear Gabby podcast. You see, I’ve been on a journey to undo the traumas of my past and become free in the present … but I knew I couldn’t speak about this healing work until I’d completed it. Well, my friend, the time is now. Tune in to this special episode to hear me get candid and raw about my healing journey, which is chronicled in my new book! Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace is out this week.
 
RESOURCES

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 

Happy Days is my most important spiritual work yet. In this brand new book, I share the 9 spiritual and therapeutic tools that helped me break free from trauma and find deep inner peace on the other side of fear and anxiety. DearGabby.com/HappyDays or https://bit.ly/3oAgu47

 

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:

If you feel you need additional support, please check out this list of mental health resources, which may serve you. I’m proud of you for being here. https://bit.ly/3BcLNqy

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby.

 

Right now, when you go to thepillclub.com/GABBY. The Pill Club is offering a $10 donation to Bedsider.org for every Dear Gabby listener who becomes a patient. Your donation will help low-income individuals get access to birth control through Bedsider.org.

 

Get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/GABBY.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Dear Gabby, How Do I Know I’m Manifesting?
item.description:
This is the #1 question I get about manifestation: “Gabby, how do I know I’m manifesting?” Here’s the deal: The Universe has some super cool ways to let you know that your prayers have been answered …. but you might not know to recognize those signs! In this episode of Dear Gabby, I’ll share the top  three signs that your manifestation is on the  way … even if you can’t see it yet.
 
 
RESOURCES

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 

My new book, Happy Days; The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. is now available for preorder. There is bravery in sharing our life stories, struggles and triumphs—and these are mine. This is the most vulnerable book I’ve written yet, and it’s also my most important spiritual work. I hope it serves you greatly. DearGabby.com/HappyDays

In this episode I reference my Best Seller Masterclass. I have distilled 15+ years of experience into this six–module digital course designed to give students everything they need to get their book into the world! If you’d like to learn more about the program, go here https://bit.ly/3LfHcZo

I also mention my FREE guide to beating writer’s block in this episode of Dear Gabby. If you’re interested in downloading the guide, you can access it here: Deargabby.com/writersblock. https://bit.ly/3B7bskF

 
MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver lessons, guided meditations and community connection. I also have a 21-day challenge planned for you each quarter! The Miracle Membership is easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3oW93of 

 

 

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:

If you need a little more support, here are more resources: https://bit.ly/31SD4Nn

 

PARTNERS:

 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Right now, Thesis is offering our listeners 10% off your first starter kit when you visit takethesis.com/GABBY.

 

For listeners of the show, Girlfriend Collective is offering $25 off your purchase of $100 or more when you go to girlfriend.com/GABBY.

 

Start a new healthy habit today. Visit seed.com/DEARGABBY and use code DEARGABBY to redeem 20% off your first month of Seed’s Daily Synbiotic.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Co-Create With The Universe To Manifest Your Dreams
item.description:
In this bonus episode of the Dear Gabby podcast, I’ll share the story of how I got the eff out of my own way, reconnected with the Universe, and manifested a life that’s beyond my wildest dreams. This is a talk from The Universe Has Your Back book tour, and it fires me up every time I listen to it. May this talk inspire you to trust in the Universal guidance that’s within you and around you. Listen now for an instant feeling of relief, knowing you are always being guided.
 
RESOURCES

Want more The Universe Has Your Back? Whether you’re reading the book for the first time or want to grab a copy for a friend, this book will serve you greatly at this time. item.title: Shift Your Perspective and Change Your Life
item.description:
Today on Dear Gabby I did something I’ve never done before. I took one caller only, and coached her in an extended one-on-one workshop. This young mother was battling cancer for the second time, and I knew that her courageous  story would help you—no matter what your circumstances are. Listen in to witness a quantum shift taking place live.
 
RESOURCES

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 
MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. If you need a little more support, here are more resources: https://bit.ly/31SD4Nn

item.title: How to Live a Spiritual Life—With Rainn Wilson & Reza Aslan
item.description:
Rainn Wilson and Reza Aslan are my guests on today’s Dear Gabby. These brilliant guys cohost Metaphysical Milkshake … and that’s an apt description for our Big Talk! We cover so much ground here, including how to infuse spirituality into every aspect of your life, how to be your own guru, and how to make joy the throughline that integrates everything you do. From philosophy to religion to the spiritual side of Dwight Schrute, it’s all in this Big Talk.

This Big Talk covers so much ground. You’ll hear us talk about: 

  • Using joy as a throughline to integrate every part of your life—even if you’re on a slightly scary Uber ride. I’ll share how I turned an uncomfortable moment into an opportunity for joy. 

  • Demystifying what it means to be a person of faith. As Reza said, “Living a spiritual life is an active choice—there’s nothing magical about it. Being a person of faith is a decision that you make.”  

  • The power of humility. I love what Rainn said about humbling ourselves to pray: “Prayer is an ability to say I need help. And there is a beautiful, bountiful, power coursing through this Universe that can help me along my journey—if I attune to it.”  

  • How to approach therapy as a spiritual practice. (I LOVE what Rainn had to say about this!)   

  • Why service to others is integral to spiritual growth. “You can't just sit in your walled garden and become more spiritual staring at a tree or a crystal with some incense burning,” Rainn said. True spirituality  also means “Serving others, connecting with others, trying to make the world a better place,”

 
RESOURCES

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode. 

 
ABOUT RAINN WILSON & REZA ASLAN: Rainn Wilson is an actor (you might know him as Dwight Schrute from The Office), a comedian, and the New York Times bestselling author of The Bassoon King: My Life in Art, Faith, and Idiocy. He’s also the founder of the YouTube Channel SoulPancake, and the cohost of the Metaphysical Milkshake podcast. 

Reza Aslan is also a host of Metaphysical Milkshake! He’s an Emmy-nominated producer, a scholar of religions, a commentator, a profressor, and the author of three books, including the #1 New York Times bestseller Zealot: The Life and Times of Jesus of Nazareth. 

 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver lessons, guided meditations and community connection. I also have a 21-day challenge planned for you each quarter! The Miracle Membership is easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3oW93of 

 

My new book, Happy Days, the Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Peace and Inner Wisdom, is available for preorder! I’d suggest getting your copy stat! If you order the book before February 7, you’ll get a V.I.P. ticket to my Live Online Event Experience on February 26, 2022 …. This is the first live event I’ve hosted in two years! DearGabby.com/HappyDays

 

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:

If you need a little more support, here are more resources: https://bit.ly/31SD4Nn

 
 
PARTNERS
 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Right now, when you go to thepillclub.com/gabby, The Pill Club is offering a $10 donation to Bedsider.org for every Dear Gabby listener who becomes a patient. Your donation will help low-income individuals get access to birth control through Bedsider.org.

 

Get started with Issuu today for FREE or if you sign up for a premium account you will get 50% off when you go to ISSUU.com/podcast and use promo code GABBY.

 

Right now, Thesis is offering our listeners 10% off your first starter kit when you visit takethesis.com/GABBY.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.description:
Are you feeling a bit … lost? Frustrated by holdups and discouraged by setbacks? If you’re nodding your head right now, know that you are not alone. But on today’s episode of Dear Gabby, I’ll let you in on a little secret: Guidance is available to you at all times, if you just know how to tap into it. Join me for Dear Gabby today and I’ll show you how to turn your setbacks into success.

item.title: 3 Ways to Boost Your Body Confidence with Katie Sturino
item.description:
Katie Sturino is my guest on today’s Big Talk, and we had a killer conversation! Katie is a champion for women—and for women’s bodies. She speaks up for herself and for her sisters in such a major way. Listen to this episode of Dear Gabby to get some easy tips on boosting your body confidence. Plus, learn how to forgive your past to find more joy in the present!
 

On today’s Big Talk, Katie and I dive deep into body confidence, self-love and forgiveness. Listen to this talk to learn: 

  • How to teach body confidence to the next generation 

  • How to bust through blocks to love and compassion 

  • How to forgive your parents and release the way you were brought up 

  • How to use fashion as a joyful form of self-expression—even if you think it’s silly! 

 

ABOUT KATIE STURINO: Katie Sturino is an entrepreneur, fashion blogger, proud dog mom and self-love expert. She’s the founder of Megbabe Beauty, host of the Boob Sweat podcast, and creator of the groundbreaking style blog, The 12-ish. 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to, so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver coaching lessons, guided meditations, workshops, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3EgEjmD

BOOKS:

For more of Katie Sturino’s empowering messages of self-love and body confidence—and some awesome illustrations—check out her book! It’s called Body Talk: How to Embrace Your Body and Start Living Your Best Life. You’re really going to dig it. 

My book Super Attractor: Methods for Manifesting a Life Beyond Your Wildest Dreams has so many tools you can use to boost your confidence and stand in the light of who you truly are! https://gabbybernstein.com/superattractorbook/

In my newest book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, I share the 9 spiritual and therapeutic tools I used to release myself from my traumatic past and find genuine happiness in the present. The book is out 2/22/22, and it’s available for preorder now. 

 

AND … if you preorder the book before February 7, 2022, you’ll get a VIP ticket to my Happy Days Live Online Event Experience. This is the first event I’ve hosted in TWO years. Can you feel my excitement? In this daylong event, you’ll experience deep immersion into the core tenets of the book. The experience is valued at $500, but you can get it here for FREE when you preorder Happy Days! Click here for all the deets. DearGabby.com/HappyDays

COURSE:

My digital course Finally Full is designed to help you find a healthy spiritual relationship with food and with yourself. 

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES: If you need any more support, I’ve created a list of mental health resources that I trust. Please use these resources any time you feel they could benefit you. https://bit.ly/32gdXnj

 
PARTNERS:
 

Show your skin you care with the Athena Club Razor Kit! Sign up today and you’ll get 20% off your first order! Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code deargabby.

 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Go to www.organifi.com/gabby and use code gabby for 25% off your order.

 

Visit Audible.com/deargabby or text deargabby to 500-500.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: 4 Ways to Stop Overthinking
item.description:
Stop overthinking it! Easier said than done, right? On this week’s episode of Dear Gabby, I’ll offer a spiritual solution to analysis paralysis. If you want to finally stop obsessing and start making decisions with ease, this is your show! I’ll teach you to trust that there is no wrong answer.
 
Want to learn to lean toward love? I’ve got you! Listen to this talk to learn:
 
  • A spiritual solution to job loss (and a powerful exercise to help you attract a new job)
  • My best tip for anyone considering a career change 
  • A mantra to help you instantly release fear 
  • How to stop overthinking and start making decisions with ease 
  • A beautiful way to support loved ones WITHOUT draining your own energy
 
RESOURCES:
The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 
MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each week I deliver brand new coaching practices, guided meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3ITdKr7
BOOKS:
In today’s Dear Gabby, I read a passage from Spirit Junkie. I hope this passage moved you—I thought it was a beautiful basis for today’s show. If you want more advice about leaning into love, check out the book! https://gabbybernstein.com/shop/books/
Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, comes out 2/22/22! In this book—my most important one yet—I share the 9 therapeutic tools that helped me recover from trauma. I make these tools super accessible, so that you can use them too. Preorder your copy here. And if you’ve suffered trauma with a little t or a big T, know that help is on the way. 
AND … if you preorder the book before February 7, 2022, you’ll get a VIP ticket to my Happy Days Live Online Event Experience. This is the first event I’ve hosted in TWO years. Can you feel my excitement? In this daylong event, you’ll experience deep immersion into the core tenets of the book. The experience is valued at $500, but you can get it here for FREE when you preorder Happy Days! Click here for all the deets. DearGabby.com/HappyDays
MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES: If you need any more support, I’ve created a list of mental health resources that I trust. Please use these resources any time you feel they could benefit you. https://bit.ly/3GSr2Cq
 
PARTNERS
 

Right now Ritual is offering my listeners 10% off your first three months. Visit ritual.com/DEARGABBY and turn healthy habits into a Ritual. 

 

Right now Kean Health is offering 20 percent % OFF WITH CODE “gabby” Visit KEANHEALTH.COM

 

You can experience Organifi's high quality superfoods without breaking the bank. Go to www.organifi.com/gabby and use code gabby for 25% off your order.

 

Right now, Thesis is offering our listeners 10% off your first starter kit when you visit takethesis.com/GABBY.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: How to Know You’re on the Right Path
item.description:
Are you ready to feel good? If the answer is “yes,” you’re sending a massive signal to the Universe: You are ready to claim your power as a Super Attractor! So what’s next? And what exactly is a Super Attractor? Just press play! In this bonus episode of Dear Gabby, I’m sharing a live talk that breaks down the most powerful lessons from my New York Times bestseller Super Attractor. You’ll learn how to live in deep synchronicity with the Universe, manifest your wildest dreams, and know that you’re being divinely guided—no matter what.
 

And this bonus episode gives you a front-row seat to one of my best live talks from my Super Attractor book launch. Listen to this talk to learn: 

  • How to receive divine messages and signs that will let you know—without a doubt—that you’re on the right path
  • Exactly what it means to be a Super Attractor (and how to activate your Super Attractor power)  
  • How to feel good and flourish, even in dark times
  • My 3-step method for instantly reframing fear
  • A spiritual method that will help you do less … and attract more
 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3oW93of 

Books

My New York Times bestselling book, Super Attractor: Methods for Manifesting a Life Beyond Your Wildest Dreams, shares all my tools for living in full alignment with the Universe. gabbybernstein.com/superattractorbook/ 

My new book, Happy Days, the Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Peace and Inner Wisdom, is available for preorder! I’d suggest getting your copy stat! If you order the book before February 7, you’ll get a V.I.P. ticket to my Live Online Event Experience on February 26, 2022 …. This is the first live event I’ve hosted in two years! DearGabby.com/HappyDays

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES:

If you need a little more support, here are more resources: https://bit.ly/31SD4Nn
 
 
PARTNERS:
 

Exclusively for listeners - Get 35% off with code “gabby” when you visit KEANHEALTH.COM

 

For listeners of the show, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at CALM.COM/deargabby.

 

To start building your wealth, and get your first $5,000 managed for FREE, for life, go to wealthfront.com/gabby

 

Get started with Issuu today for FREE or if you sign up for a premium account you will get 50% off when you go to ISSUU.com/podcast and use promo code GABBY.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Your Guide to the Life of Your Dreams
item.description:
This episode of Dear Gabby is very close to my heart. I’m going to share the exact methods I use to overcome anxiety and live the life of my dreams. It took me 40 years to master this, and I’m distilling everything I know into this  podcast—and into my new book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace. I cannot wait to share these tools and help you design the life you deserve.

 

Today I’ll help you turn your vision into reality, too. It’s simpler than you think! You’ll learn:

  • How to create a meaningful and authentic vision for your new life (don’t get overwhelmed … this is super fun!) 

  • The number-one change you need to make to turn your dream into reality  

  • An exercise you can do each morning to get spiritually aligned and in flow with the Universe (when you’re in this state, the magic starts to happen) 

  • A journaling practice to help you claim your desire …. and trust that it’s on the way!  

 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention in the episode: 

 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: DearGabby.com/MiracleMembership

 

MANIFESTING CHALLENGE: It’s not too late to join the 2022 Manifesting Challenge! If you enjoyed this Dear Gabby episode on how to turn your dreams into a reality, this 21-day challenge is going to rock your world! I’ll be your coach through the first three weeks of the new year, and I’ll be in your inbox every day with a new lesson in manifesting. These are the exact tools I used to create a life that’s beyond my wildest dreams, and I can’t wait to share them with you. Click here to join: DearGabby.com/ManifestingChallenge


HAPPY DAYS BOOK LAUNCH & EVENT: My book, Happy Days: The Guided Path from Trauma to Profound Freedom and Inner Peace, comes out on 2/22/22! I can’t wait to get this book into your hands. And if you’re thinking about buying it, I urge you to order it NOW! If you preorder the book by February 7, you’ll get a VIP ticket to the first LIVE full-day event I’ve hosted in two years! Click here to preorder your copy, and get all the details: DearGabby.com/HappyDays

 
PARTNERS
 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

You can experience Organifi's high quality superfoods without breaking the bank. Go to www.organifi.com/gabby and use code gabby for 25% off your order.

 

Stop guessing and start testing! Dear Gabby listeners Get 20% off with code “gabby” - just visit KEANHEALTH.COM 

 

Go to www.gemvitamins.com/GABBY or enter GABBY at checkout for 30% off your first order.

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: 5 Ways To Stop Procrastinating & Achieve Success Now
item.description:
What are you putting off right now that needs to be done? Whatever it is, I’m going to help you tackle it on today’s Dear Gabby. And — here’s the twist — you’re actually going to have FUN while you do it. Press play to learn how to stop procrastinating, start taking action on your desires, and experience great joy along the way! Then, be sure to tag me on Instagram when your to-do list is CLEAR.

In this podcast, you’ll learn: 

  • The hidden fear that keeps us stuck in procrastination — and how to overcome it 

  • The only goal you need to set for yourself every single day (this will make you so much more productive … and joyful!) 

  • How to take the pressure off, and make it FUN to work through your to-do list 

  • How to stop sweeping things under the rug, and broach difficult conversations with grace (<-- this is something we ALL put off) 

  • How to ignite your Super Attractor energy and start manifesting your desires with ease 

RESOURCES: 
 
The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://gabbybernstein.com/miraclemembership/

Mental Health resources: Click here for more support https://bit.ly/3qMAGBN

Trainings & Challenges:
-Finally Full: deargabby.com/finallyfull

item.title: Stop Losing Yourself in Relationships with Dr. Shefali
item.description:
Let’s talk about love, my friend. And while we’re at it, let’s revolutionize the way we look at marriage, divorce and parenthood! In today’s Big Talk with Dr. Shefali, you’ll learn a radical new way to look at these institutions. Dr. Shefali is here to bust through the myths that we’ve bought into as a society and help us tap back into our own inner truths.

 

On today’s podcast, you’ll learn: 

 

  • How to break free of the patterns you’ve unconsciously adopted to live a freer, more authentic life 

  • How to bring the ego’s patterns to the light, so that you can interrupt them  

  • How to remove the blocks to the love within you (when you do this, you will hear the voice of your true self!) 

  • Why divorce is not a betrayal, but an opportunity to evolve into your most authentic self

  • How to free yourself from heartbreak by shifting your expectations 

  • How to find deep, abundant love in your life (hint: This has nothing to do with whether you’re single or in a relationship!) 

 

Buckle up …. you’re going to come out of today’s Dear Gabby with your eyes open wide! 

 

RESOURCES

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

 

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported, and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. https://gabbybernstein.com/miraclemembership/

 

Dr. Shefali Tsabary is a clinical psychologist, a leader in mindful living, and an expert in parenting and family dynamics . She’s written four books, including the New York Times bestsellers The Conscious Parent and The Awakened Family. Her latest book, A Radical Awakening, teaches women how to transcend societal expectations and live free, authentic lives. 

 

I’ve opened up registration to the 2022 21-Day Manifesting Challenge! The Manifesting Challenge is my plan that will help you effortlessly manifest and become a magnet for your desires in just 21 days. Secure your spot for the 2022 Manifesting Challenge: gabbybernstein.com/manifestingchallenge

 

PARTNERS

 

To access a free sample class and learn how you can save 30% on tuition right now, visit integrativenutrition.com/deargabby

 

Go to Zocdoc.com/GABBY and download the Zocdoc app to sign-up for FREE and book a top-rated doctor. Many are available as soon as today.

 

Show your skin you care with the Athena Club Razor Kit! Sign up today and you’ll get 20% off your first order! Just go to AthenaClub.com and use promo code deargabby.

 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Turn Your Desires into Reality in 2022
item.description:
Each new year is a chance to put powerful new manifestations in motion. In this episode of Dear Gabby, I’m going to help you turn your dreams into reality in 2022. I’ll help you lay the groundwork to become a magnet for everything you desire next year. And I’ll teach you the KEY to manifesting. In this super high-vibe episode, you’ll also learn: 

  • How to set spiritually aligned boundaries that will protect you from burnout 

  • How to take action from a place of service and love (and why this is KEY to getting in sync with the Universe)

  • How to cultivate true abundance—regardless of what’s in your bank account 

  • The simplest way to manifest your desires (warning: most people have this backwards!)

  • An exercise for attracting your dream job 

  • How to be grateful for the tough times in your life

RESOURCES: 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

OMG, the 21-Day Manifesting Challenge starts on January 1, and registration is OPEN! This challenge enables you to clear away all the belief systems that hold you back from stepping into freedom and light. It will turn up your Super Attractor power in such a major way. Let me coach you through the first 21 days of 2022! https://bit.ly/3GoRCTc

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3I0z6m1

Super Attractor offers spiritual tools for getting deep into a state of appreciation. gabbybernstein.com/superattractorbook

Mental Health Resources: https://bit.ly/3pahlYz

 

PARTNERS

 

Go to StoryWorth.com/gabby and save $10 on your first purchase!

 

Go to NativeDeo.com/gabby, or use promo code gabby at checkout, and get twenty percent off your first order.

 

Go to arrae.com and use code ’gabby’ at checkout for 10% off of one time purchases or 25% off first month on subscription.

item.title: Stop Feeling Guilty for Being Happy with Fearne Cotton
item.description:
If you’re a Dear Gabby listener, you know that it’s good to feel good! But do you feel that? On today’s Big Talk, my brilliant friend Fearne Cotton TOTALLY called herself out: Sometimes she feels guilty for being happy. I know many of you can relate ... so press play on this podcast! I’ll help you learn that the better you feel, the more light you can spread in this world. Feeling good is not a luxury, it’s your responsibility! I’ll also share feel-good tools that will help you surrender control and flow through the holiday season with ease .... and log a few extra hours of sleep.

 

This episode also touches on so many other ways you can surrender control and really start flowing with the Universe! You’ll learn: 

  • How to lean into joy and focus on what’s thriving, like it’s your JOB (because it is!) 

  • The power of speaking your truth and how to do it with confidence and ease 

  • How to dismantle the belief that it’s selfish to feel good (this is a MAJOR misconception!) 

  • How to master the art of allowing, so that you don’t strangle your desires with controlling energy 

  • How to tap into feelings of deep worthiness 


This Dear Gabby Big Talk also offers a profound message that will allow you to see the light—and the divine opportunity—in any dark moment. When you learn to see a difficult moment as a form of guidance, you’ll be absolutely fearless in life. 

RESOURCES:

 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode: 

ABOUT FEARNE: Fearne Cotton is one of the top broadcasters in the U.K.—and she’s a happiness expert. This British powerhouse is the author of several books detailing her own journeys with happiness. Happy, Calm, and Quiet are must-reads! She launched the Happy Place podcast in 2018, and has gone on to interview everyone from Russell Brand to Alicia Keys. 


HAPPY DAYS BOOK LAUNCH & LIVE VIRTUAL EVENT EXPERIENCE: 
Want a FREE VIP ticket to the biggest event of 2022? When you preorder the book, Happy Days, you’ll score a FREE ticket to the Live Virtual Event Experience on February 26, 2022! Claim your spot here: deargabby.com/happydays

FREE TRAINING: Your 5-Step Guide to Unlock Purpose and Abundance: Sign up here: DearGabby.com/purpose

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. This is the key to manifesting a life beyond your wildest dreams. Each month I deliver new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/2VfIkXB

item.title: Stop Being So Judgy: 7 Ways to Clear Blocks to What You Want
item.description:
Today’s Dear Gabby is a BIG one. In this episode, I’ll teach you the mindset shift that will change EVERY area of your life! This shift will take the focus off of what’s not working and amplify what you really want. I’ll also give you spiritual tools to cope with the more triggering aspects of the holiday season, so you don’t get stuck in a judgment cycle that brings down your vibes. This podcast will ensure that your holidays are awesome and set you up to win for the year ahead.  

Press play on today’s Dear Gabby to learn:

  • The fastest way to get what you want … and stop attracting what you DON’T want
  • How to lay a spiritual foundation so that you can handle anything that comes at you with grace and ease (because being a Super Attractor is NOT about living a perfect life!)
  • How to welcome a “bad thing” as a spiritual assignment, knowing that the Universe has your back
  • How to radically change your life by adopting a solution-oriented mindset
  • How to process your big feelings and come out the other side with unshakable resilience
Resources:
 
The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP:
Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3oJPXke

Happy Days is launching 2/22/22. You can preorder and get a  FREE VIP ticket to my Happy Days Live Online Event Experience (valued at $500) the week the book comes out. Click here to preorder the book and claim your free VIP ticket: https://bit.ly/3DrtK0p

item.title: The #1 Method for Staying HAPPY during the Holidays
item.description:
Today’s episode of Dear Gabby is all about appreciation—and there’s no way you can listen to it without having FUN! Today I’m feeling playful, and I’m teaching you a game. This isn’t just any game, my friend ... This simple and addictive exercise literally changed my life. And when I taught it to the guests on today’s podcast, every one of them moved out of a fearful state and started leaning toward love in that moment! Now it’s your turn. Listen in to learn how to play the Appreciation Game. This will adjust your energy and have you feeling good fast—*especially* if you’re going through a tough time.

 

In this episode, you’ll also learn: 

  • A 5-minute practice to put you into a deep state of appreciation every single day

  • How to retrain your brain to stop catastrophizing and start joyfully anticipating the best-case scenario

  • A simple prayer to give you instant relief from feelings of chaos 

  • The true practice of gratitude and appreciation (hint: it’s not just making a gratitude list!) 

 
RESOURCES:

 

Happy Days book preorder & Live Virtual Event Experience:

Want a FREE VIP ticket to the biggest event of 2022? When you preorder the book, Happy Days, you’ll score a FREE ticket to the Live Virtual Event Experience on February 26, 2022! Claim your spot here: deargabby.com/happydays

Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/2VfIkXB

item.title: 4 Ways to Overcome Your Inner Critic & Claim Your Confidence with Mel Robbins
item.description:
Some of the most important things I’ve ever done in my life almost didn’t happen. If I’d listened to the voice of fear in my head, and if I’d let my inner critic win, I would never have written any of my books—or launched this podcast! Luckily, I used my spiritual tools to shut down my inner critic. I’ll teach you how to do the same on today’s Big Talk with Mel Robbins. Mel has a simple, surefire technique you can use to stop criticizing yourself for good. 

 

This episode is the self-confidence boost we could all use! Listen to hear:

  • How to shift your perspective to turn anxiety into excitement
  • My awesome method for feeling empowered and authentic every day
  • How to overcome your inner critic for good
  • The sneaky habit that leads to self-rejection and doubt (SO many of us do this without even realizing it!)
  • Why regulating your nervous system is KEY to changing how you see yourself …. and a beautiful story about how Mel “smoothed out” hers

RESOURCES:

-ABOUT MEL ROBBINS: Mel Robbins is one of the most booked speakers in the world, and it’s no wonder! She has an incredible knack for developing methods that will change your life in five seconds flat. Her bestselling book The 5 Second Rule is an international phenomenon. And her brand new book, The High 5 Habit, is already a New York Times bestseller. Better yet, it’s sparking a major movement of self-love and empowerment. Buy the book here: https://amzn.to/3Bua3Eb

 

-Happy Days book preorder & Live Virtual Event Experience: Want a FREE VIP ticket to the biggest event of 2022? When you preorder the book, Happy Days, you’ll score a FREE ticket to the Live Virtual Event Experience on February 26, 2022! Claim your spot here: deargabby.com/happydays

 

-FREE TRAINING: Your 5-Step Guide to Unlock Purpose and Abundance: Sign up here: DearGabby.com/purpose

 

-MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP: Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3ETu08J

 

-In this FREE Anxiety Relief Workshop, I demonstrate my heart hold and share other awesome tips for feeling calm: https://bit.ly/3GUMY0t

 

-Mental Health Resources: https://bit.ly/3GUSjov

 

 

PARTNERS

 

Go to GreenChef.com/gabby125 and use code gabby125 to get $125 off including free shipping!

item.title: 5 Ways to Process Your Feelings
item.description:
Your life is a spiritual school, and it’s in session now! Here’s your first assignment: Learn to see any circumstance—no matter what it is—through a lens of love. In this episode of Dear Gabby, I’ll show you how to live life with a loving perspective, rather than fear. You’ll learn to embrace any difficult situation as an opportunity to show up for yourself with compassion. No matter what's going on in your life, no matter what's happening around you, choose to see your circumstances through the lens of love.
 
In this episode, you’ll hear:

  • An awesome 90-second technique to restore calm 

  • How to stop numbing your feelings and feel what you need to

  • Ways to trust and care for yourself in every situation

  • How to see every experience as a learning opportunity to get closer to love

  • Why we spiritually bypass and how to stop doing it 

No matter what's going on in your life, no matter what's happening around you, choose to see your circumstances through the lens of love. Click play to wipe your spiritual lens today! 

 

RESOURCES:

These are beautiful meditations for cultivating your Super Attractor energy and for practicing leaning in to love. If you’re ready to take your spiritual journey further, I want to give you all the resources you need. Take the first steps on your personal growth path by clicking the link to gain instant access to these totally FREE meditations! https://gabbybernstein.com/freemeditations/

item.title: The #1 Reason You’re Blocking What You Want and How to Fix it
item.description:
In this bonus episode of Dear Gabby, you’ll hear a talk from my Judgment Detox book launch event. If you haven’t heard me speak live, I think you’ll really enjoy this! On stage is where I light up, and I was super inspired to share these life-changing tips with my audience. In this talk, I explain the 6 steps for releasing judgment. If you practice this method, you’ll feel more free than you ever have before—and that’s a guarantee. 
 

Join me for this live talk to learn:

  • A simple morning ritual that will help you live in faith every day
  • How to witness your judgment without judgment
  • How to honor your core wounds to get to the root cause of your judgment
  • How to release resistance so that miracles can occur naturally in your life
  • How to shut down your inner critic and show up for your gifts (this is SO important!)
  • Why I KNEW I had to write Judgment Detox to begin with, and how the book can serve you

Don’t worry—I don’t expect you to never judge anyone or anything again. You’re human, and that’s okay! But if you diligently apply the steps I lay out in this talk, you won’t believe your judgments anymore.

 
 
RESOURCES:

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

 

Happy Days book preorder & Live Virtual Event Experience

Want a FREE VIP ticket to the biggest event of 2022? When you preorder the book, Happy Days, you’ll score a FREE ticket to the Live Virtual Event Experience on February 26, 2022! Claim your spot here: http://deargabby.com/happydays

 

FREE TRAINING: 

Need some inspiration? I just dropped a FREE training that will crack you wide open to creative possibilities. It’s called: Your 5-Step Guide to Unlock Purpose & Abundance. You can get it for free, right now, at DearGabby.com/purpose. Here’s what you’ll learn: 

  • My method for thriving in financially insecure times
  • The #1 reason you’re blocking your dreams, and how to fix it
  • The only thing you need to prioritize to fulfill your purpose
  • How to stop pushing and take action with confidence

This one is maaaaaajor — you don’t want to miss it! 

 

BOOKS & CARDS

Judgement Detox: gabbybernstein.com/judgment-detox-book

 

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3xBSsat

 

PARTNERS

 

To access a free sample class and learn how you can save 30% on tuition right now, visit integrativenutrition.com/deargabby

 

Go to FLEXFITS.com/gabby and use code gabby for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits—or 10% off your first Flex Cup—PLUS free U.S. shipping!

item.title: How to Live Without Anxiety
item.description:
In this episode of Dear Gabby, I teach a method for releasing anxiety that has helped me tremendously. I call it the Think It To Feel It Method. I’m so psyched to teach it to you. It’s a really simple way to open up your consciousness to creative possibilities, to shift your mindset, and to ground yourself in a miraculous new state of being. 

We have the power within us to alchemize our circumstances, and create the world that we want to see. I’m thrilled to take you on a transformational  journey today. 

On today’s episode, we’ll also dig into: 

  • How to believe that we can be in a different state — even if we can’t see it yet 

  • Why you MUST care for your inner child before you care for anyone else 

  • The first step on the path to spiritual surrender (this is a BIG one) 

  • The #1 thing that stops us from being present in the moment, and what to do instead

  • How to stop strangling your desire by trying to control the outcome 

It’s not easy to give up control and the anxiety that goes along with it. But my prayer is that by listening to this episode, you feel safe enough to take your hands off the wheel.


 
RESOURCES: 

 

The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

item.title: Jay Shetty & Lewis Howes on Vulnerability, Relationships and Living Your Purpose
item.description:
When I sat down with my honorary brothers Lewis Howes and Jay Shetty—a.k.a. two of the best podcast hosts on Earth—I couldn’t wait to dive into the Big Talk. Vulnerability, lasting love, how to find your purpose in life, sex, career, regrets …. we tackled them all. 
 

We dove right into big, beautiful topics, and we held nothing back. When the Big Talk started flowing, I never wanted it to stop.

On today’s Big Talk, we explore:

  • How to deepen your conversational skills for more meaningful connections
  • What it means to be an active listener
  • How to attract the right romantic partner into your life (and why you might attracting Mr. or Ms. Wrong)
  • How to view vulnerability as a loving exchange
  • The key to a long-lasting relationship
  • How to cope with being an extrovert in these isolating times
This Big Talk is packed with so many amazing life lessons, and they’re guaranteed to enhance your closest relationships. 
 
RESOURCES:
The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

ABOUT JAY
Jay Shetty is a former monk, a transformational life coach, and host of the On Purpose podcast. He’s also the author of Think Like a Monk, and the co-creator of my favorite new beverage, Sama tea.
Think Like a Monk: https://amzn.to/2XD2Mmv
On Purpose podcast: https://jayshetty.me/podcast/
Sama tea: https://www.samatea.com/

Sama tea is an adaptogenic tea brand launched by Jay and Radhi Shetty. Their line of hot tea is USDA organic, gluten-free, vegan and packed with adaptogens that help you feel your best from the inside out. (The mint-blueberry … O.M.G.)


ABOUT LEWIS
A former pro football player, Lewis Howes is a superstar business coach, author and keynote speaker. He’s written books including The School of Greatness and The Mask of Masculinity—along with others—and he hosts the incredible School of Greatness podcast.  
The School Of Greatness: https://amzn.to/3zrLMN6
The School of Greatness podcast: https://lewishowes.com/sogpodcast/


MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP

Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join. https://bit.ly/3kuKpsG


MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES
  • Safety, Recovery, and Mental Health Resources: https://bit.ly/3hZRsbb
  • 1in6.org: https://1in6.org/
 
PARTNERS
 

Visit vitruvi.com/deargabby and use code DEARGABBY20 to get 20% off your next purchase.

 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Find the relief product range and the whole Dosist health line-up today at dosisthealth.com. Use promo code DEARGABBY for 20% off your purchase. Now through 12/31/21.

 

Create a space that brings you joy with Joybird. Visit joybird.com/GABBY and get 30% off your purchase.

 

Produced by Dear Media.
